original: dbang po mchog @269b dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa ston pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po mchog @269b dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa ston pa'o //

original: rab tu dga' ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba'o //

original: 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba'o //

analyzed: btang snyoms kyis nges par brtags pa'o //

original: theg pa gsum rnam par 'jog pa'o //

original: bskal pa'i mes tshig par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / chus 'jig par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnas par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sa'i khams su 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang /
analyzed: bskal pa'i mes tshig par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / chus 'jig par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnas par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sa'i khams su 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang /

analyzed: rdul phra rab kyi rdul du 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / rtsva dang / @272b shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal du 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / skar ma'i gzugs su 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / zhing rab 'byams re rer sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang /
translated: the number of atoms that will be there, the number of grasses, bushes, trees, medicinal plants, and forests that will be there, the number of stellar bodies that will be there, the number of buddhas that will appear in each of those infinite buddhafields,

original: nyan thos 'byung bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'byung bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / zas kyi mchog gi longs spyod dang / dbugs 'byung ba dang /
analyzed: nyan thos 'byung bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'byung bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / zas kyi mchog gi longs spyod dang / dbugs 'byung ba dang /
translated: the number of ≈õrƒÅvakas who will appear, the number of pratyekabuddhas who will appear, the number of bodhisattvas who will appear, the enjoyments of the supreme food,

original: rdub pa dang / 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / spyod lam du 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rab 'byams re res nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen pos sems can thar bar byed par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: rdub pa dang / 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / spyod lam du 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rab 'byams re res nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen pos sems can thar bar byed par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: the inhaling and exhaling of breath, the walking, sitting, and conduct that will occur, and the number of sentient beings that each of the infinite tathƒÅgatas will liberate through the vehicle of the ≈õrƒÅvakas, the vehicle of the pratyekabuddhas, and the Great Vehicle‚Äîthe TathƒÅgata knows all of that.

analyzed: zhing rab 'byams re re na sems can rnams kyi skye ba'i gnas ji snyed pa dang / sems dang sems las byung ba ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma 'ongs pa'i sems kyi rgyun bskal par 'gyur ba ma yin par ma 'ongs pa la lta bas sems can rnams
translated: In each of the infinite realms, the TathƒÅgata knows all the places where sentient beings are born, and all the thoughts and mental factors that arise.

original: la chos ston te /
analyzed: la chos ston te /
translated: Even though the TathƒÅgata knows this, he teaches the Dharma to sentient beings in the future without his future mind-stream changing for an eon.

original: 'di ni / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o //üîΩde la @273a *//
analyzed: 'di ni / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o // de la @273a *//

original: 'di skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di skad ces bya'o //

analyzed: dri med mig gis ma 'ongs dus na ni //

analyzed: ma 'ongs pa yi dmigs par gtong ba na //

analyzed: de yi sems ni nam yang g-yeng ba med //

analyzed: sems can rnams la de bzhin chos ston te //

analyzed: 'di ni rkang gnyis mchog gi 'phrin las yin //

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /

original: ji ltar 'jug ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'jug ce na /

original: 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas phyogs bcu dag na da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad bgrang ba rnam pa gsum gyi tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to //

analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu mkhyen to //

analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu mkhyen to //

original: da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos thams cad rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos thams cad rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: all the present hearers,

original: da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu mkhyen to //

analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i skar ma'i gzugs thams cad rab tu mkhyen to //

translated: He knows all the present grasses, bushes, herbs, and forests.üîΩHe knows by means of counting all the present particles of earth in the ten directions.

original: phyogs bcu'i chu'i khams skra'i rtse mo'i blangs pa'i thigs pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to //üîΩphyogs bcu'i me'i khams kyi skye ba dang / 'gag pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to //

analyzed: phyogs bcu'i rlung gi khams thams cad kyang gzugs su gyur pa la bab pa'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to //

analyzed: phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyang skra'i rtse mos rgyas par dgang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to //

analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i sems can gyi khams rnam pa gsum yang rab tu mkhyen to //

original: de'i skye ba'i rgyu dang / thar pa'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de'i skye ba'i rgyu dang / thar pa'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to //

analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to //

analyzed: de'i skye ba'i rgyu dang / thar pa'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to //

analyzed: de'i skye ba'i rgyu dang / thar pa'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to //

analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i mir gyur pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to //

original: de'i skye ba'i rgyu dang / thar pa'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to //üîΩda ltar byung @274a *//
analyzed: de'i skye ba'i rgyu dang / thar pa'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to // da ltar byung @274a *//

original: de'i skye ba'i rgyu dang / thar pa'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de'i skye ba'i rgyu dang / thar pa'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to //

analyzed: gdul bar 'os pa ma yin pa dag gi dbang po rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen to //

original: de bzhin gshegs pas de ltar rab tu mkhyen kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gnyis kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa med cing gnyis su med pa la gzung ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos kyang ston te /

analyzed: rgyal ba rnams kyi spyod yul thug pa med //

original: 'di lta ste /

translated: it is like this:

original: dper na / nor bu mkhan mkhas pa nor bu sbyong ba'i cho ga shin tu shes pa des nor bu'i rigs las sbyang ba ma byas pa'i nor bu rin po che blangs nas bul thog gi chu rnon pos bkrus te skra nag po'i la bas byi dor bya bas byi dor
analyzed: dper na / nor bu mkhan mkhas pa nor bu sbyong ba'i cho ga shin tu shes pa des nor bu'i rigs las sbyang ba ma byas pa'i nor bu rin po che blangs nas bul thog gi chu rnon pos bkrus te skra nag po'i la bas byi dor bya bas byi dor
translated: A skilled jeweler who has thorough knowledge of the methods of polishing gems takes a precious gem from its ore, but without having polished it, washes it with a strong solution of lye and polishes it with black wool.

original: byed kyang de tsam gyis brtson 'grus rgyun mi gcod kyi /
analyzed: byed kyang de tsam gyis brtson 'grus rgyun mi gcod kyi /
translated: Even though he does this, he does not stop his efforts there.

original: de'i 'og tu dngul chu rnon po dang bcas pas bkrus te shing dang snam bus byi dor bya bas byi dor byed do //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dngul chu rnon po dang bcas pas bkrus te shing dang snam bus byi dor bya bas byi dor byed do //
translated: Then, after washing it with a strong acid, it is polished with a piece of wood and a piece of woolen cloth.

original: de tsam gyis kyang brtson 'grus rgyun mi gcod de /
analyzed: de tsam gyis kyang brtson 'grus rgyun mi gcod de /
translated: But even that is not the end of the polishing.

original: de'i 'og tu'ang sman chen po'i khu bas bkrus te ras phra mos byi dor bya bas byi dor byed do //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu'ang sman chen po'i khu bas bkrus te ras phra mos byi dor bya bas byi dor byed do //
translated: After that, it is washed with a solution of great herbs and polished with a fine cloth.

original: byi dor byas te nor bu mching bu'i rigs dang bral nas bee d'urya zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byi dor byas te nor bu mching bu'i rigs dang bral nas bee d'urya zhes bya'o //
translated: When it is polished and free from the class of glass, it is called beryl.

original: rigs kyi bu /

analyzed: de tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus rgyun mi gcod cing /
translated: The Tathagata does not stop his effort there.

original: de'i 'og tu stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i gtam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khong du chud par byed do //

analyzed: de tsam gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus rgyun mi gcod kyi /

original: gzugs can ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs can ma yin pa'o //

analyzed: yi ge thams cad kyi nang nas yi ge gang dang gang gis chos ston par rtsom pa'i yi ge de dang de zad par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: rgyun chad pa med par chos kyi tshul don dang tshig 'bru dang ldan pa ston to //

translated: has a pure body through conduct.

original: spobs pas ngag rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: spobs pas ngag rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: He has a pure speech through eloquence.

original: byams pa sgom pas sems rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: byams pa sgom pas sems rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: He has a pure mind through cultivating loving kindness.

original: chos dang zang zing sbyin pa la ser sna med pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: chos dang zang zing sbyin pa la ser sna med pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: He has pure generosity through being free of stinginess in giving the Dharma and material things.

original: tshul khrims nyams pa med pas tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: tshul khrims nyams pa med pas tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: He has pure discipline through not violating the precepts.

original: zhe 'gras pa'i sems med pas bzod pa rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: zhe 'gras pa'i sems med pas bzod pa rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: He has pure patience through being free of a hostile mind.

original: legs par byed pa'i las byed pas brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: legs par byed pa'i las byed pas brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: He has pure diligence through engaging in good actions.

original: de la ma chags pas bsam gtan rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: de la ma chags pas bsam gtan rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: Since he is not attached to them, his concentration is pure.

original: ye shes kyi snang ba rab rib med pas shes rab rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: ye shes kyi snang ba rab rib med pas shes rab rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: Since the light of his wisdom is unclouded, his wisdom is pure.

original: kha na ma tho ba med pas las rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba med pas las rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: Since he is without fault, his actions are pure.

original: lha'i mig yongs su dag pas mig rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: lha'i mig yongs su dag pas mig rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: Since his divine eye is pure, his eyes are pure.

original: lha'i snang ba thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos bstan pa nyan pas rna ba rnam par dag pa yin no //üîΩde bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri la @286a *//
analyzed: lha'i snang ba thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos bstan pa nyan pas rna ba rnam par dag pa yin no // de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri la @286a *//
translated: Since he has attained the light of the gods and listens to the Dharma teachings of all the Tathagatas, his ears are pure.

original: snom pa'i phyir sna rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: snom pa'i phyir sna rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: Since he smells the fragrance of the Tathagata‚Äôs morality, his nose is pure.

original: ro zhim po la brkam pa med pa'i phyir lce rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: ro zhim po la brkam pa med pa'i phyir lce rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: Since he is not greedy for delicious tastes, his tongue is pure.

original: brdzus te skye bas mngal gyi dri mas mi gos pa'i phyir lus rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: brdzus te skye bas mngal gyi dri mas mi gos pa'i phyir lus rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: Since he is born miraculously and is not sullied by the impurities of the womb, his body is pure.

original: chos rab tu 'byed pa la mkhas pas sems rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: chos rab tu 'byed pa la mkhas pas sems rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: Since he is skilled in discerning the Dharma, his mind is pure.

original: mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pas gzugs rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pas gzugs rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: He has a pure body, being well adorned with the major and minor marks.

original: yid du 'ong ba'i sgra brjod pas sgra rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: yid du 'ong ba'i sgra brjod pas sgra rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: He has a pure voice, speaking in a pleasant way.

original: tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / gtong ba'i dris yongs su bsgos pas dri rnam par dag pa yin no; ;skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob pas ro rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / gtong ba'i dris yongs su bsgos pas dri rnam par dag pa yin no; ;skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob pas ro rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: He has a pure smell, being perfumed by morality, learning, and generosity. He has a pure taste, having attained the supreme taste of the marks of a great man.

original: 'jam zhing mnyen pa'i rkang lag thob pas reg pa rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jam zhing mnyen pa'i rkang lag thob pas reg pa rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: He has a pure touch, having attained soft and supple hands and feet.

original: chos la snang ba thob pas chos rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: chos la snang ba thob pas chos rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: He has a pure Dharma, having attained the light of the Dharma.

original: ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams ma brjed pas dran pa rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams ma brjed pas dran pa rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: He has a pure memory, not forgetting the teachings he has heard.

original: bdud kyi lam las shin tu 'das pas blo gros rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: bdud kyi lam las shin tu 'das pas blo gros rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: He has a pure intellect, having transcended the path of Mara.

original: chos zab mo rtogs par khong du chud pas rtogs pa rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: chos zab mo rtogs par khong du chud pas rtogs pa rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: He has a pure understanding, having realized the profound Dharma.

original: gzungs 'di la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: gzungs 'di la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
translated: The bodhisattva who is established in this dhƒÅra·πáƒ´

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed sgras go bar byed pa de snyed 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed sgras go bar byed pa de snyed 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs so //
translated: fills with light as many buddha-fields as can be known by sound.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: gzungs 'di nyid kyi ma 'dres pa'i khyad par rab tu thob pas 'od des phyogs bcu'i @286b sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi tshul 'byung bar byed do //
analyzed: gzungs 'di nyid kyi ma 'dres pa'i khyad par rab tu thob pas 'od des phyogs bcu'i @286b sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi tshul 'byung bar byed do //
translated: By attaining the special unshared quality of this very dhƒÅra·πáƒ´, that light causes the way of the Dharma taught by all the buddhas of the ten directions to arise.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa'i gzungs 'di ni /
analyzed: sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa'i gzungs 'di ni /
translated: this dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ of pure sound

original: gang cung zad gzhol bar 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: gang cung zad gzhol bar 'jug pa ste /
translated: is what is to be engaged in.

original: sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa'i gzungs 'di bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa'i gzungs 'di bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching of this dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ of pure sound

original: tshad med de /
analyzed: tshad med de /
translated: is immeasurable.

original: yi ge rnam par phye bas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //üîΩnges par bstan pas mtha' yas pa'o //üîΩrnam par gdon mi za bas tshad med pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge rnam par phye bas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o // nges par bstan pas mtha' yas pa'o // rnam par gdon mi za bas tshad med pa'o //
translated: It is inconceivable due to the analysis of syllables.üîΩIt is limitless due to the definitive teaching.üîΩIt is immeasurable due to the certainty.

original: bshad pas thug pa med pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pas thug pa med pa'o //
translated: It is inexhaustible due to the explanation.

original: gzhol bar 'jug pas chags pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gzhol bar 'jug pas chags pa med pa'o //
translated: It is unattached due to the engagement.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: de la mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs gang zhe na /
translated: What is the inexhaustible casket dhƒÅra·πáƒ´?

original: 'di lta ste; gzungs kyi bstan pa mi zad pa ste /üîΩgzugs mi rtag go /
analyzed: 'di lta ste; gzungs kyi bstan pa mi zad pa ste / gzugs mi rtag go /
translated: It is the inexhaustible teaching of the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´s.

original: zhes mi rtag par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal lo //
analyzed: zhes mi rtag par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal lo //
translated: It is the inexhaustible teaching of impermanence, teaching that form is impermanent.

original: zhes sdug bsngal bar bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs bdag med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes sdug bsngal bar bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs bdag med pa'o //
translated: It is the inexhaustible teaching of suffering, teaching that form is suffering.

original: zhes bdag med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs zhi ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bdag med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs zhi ba'o //
translated: It is the inexhaustible teaching of selflessness, teaching that form is selfless.

original: zhes zhi bar bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs dben pa'o //üîΩzhes dben par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs dbu ba rdos pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes zhi bar bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs dben pa'o // zhes dben par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs dbu ba rdos pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is the inexhaustible teaching of peace, teaching that form is peaceful.üîΩIt is the inexhaustible teaching of isolation, teaching that form is isolated.

original: zhes dbu ba rdos pa lta bur bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes dbu ba rdos pa lta bur bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: It is the inexhaustible teaching of the analogy of a mass of foam, teaching that form is like a mass of foam.üîΩIt is the inexhaustible teaching of the analogy of an illusion, teaching that form is like an illusion.

original: zhes sgyu ma lta bur bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs smig rgyu lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes sgyu ma lta bur bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs smig rgyu lta bu'o //
translated: It is the inexhaustible teaching of the analogy of a mirage, teaching that form is like a mirage.

original: zhes smig rgyu lta bur bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs chu'i zla ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes smig rgyu lta bur bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs chu'i zla ba lta bu'o //
translated: It is the inexhaustible teaching of the analogy of a reflection of the moon in water, teaching that form is like a reflection of the moon in water.

original: zhes chu'i zla ba lta bur bstan pa mi zad pa dang / @287a *//
analyzed: zhes chu'i zla ba lta bur bstan pa mi zad pa dang / @287a *//
translated: This is the inexhaustible teaching that it is like the moon in water.

original: gzugs rmi lam lta bu'o //
analyzed: gzugs rmi lam lta bu'o //
translated: Form is like a dream.üîΩThis is the inexhaustible teaching that it is like a dream.

original: zhes rmi lam lta bur bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs brag ca lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes rmi lam lta bur bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs brag ca lta bu'o //
translated: Form is like an echo.üîΩThis is the inexhaustible teaching that it is like an echo.

original: zhes brag ca lta bur bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs mig yor lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes brag ca lta bur bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs mig yor lta bu'o //
translated: Form is like an apparition.üîΩThis is the inexhaustible teaching that it is like an apparition.

original: zhes mig yor lta bur bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs gzugs brnyan lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes mig yor lta bur bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs gzugs brnyan lta bu'o //
translated: Form is like a reflection.üîΩThis is the inexhaustible teaching that it is like a reflection.

original: zhes gzugs brnyan lta bur bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes gzugs brnyan lta bur bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'o //
translated: Form is essenceless.üîΩThis is the inexhaustible teaching that it is essenceless.

original: zhes ngo bo nyid med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes ngo bo nyid med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Form is unreal.üîΩThis is the inexhaustible teaching that it is unreal.

original: zhes dngos po med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs gnas med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes dngos po med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs gnas med pa'o //
translated: Form is baseless.üîΩThis is the inexhaustible teaching that it is baseless.

original: zhes gnas med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs stong pa'o //
analyzed: zhes gnas med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs stong pa'o //
translated: Form is empty.üîΩThis is the inexhaustible teaching that it is empty.

original: zhes stong par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs mtshan ma med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes stong par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs mtshan ma med pa'o //
translated: Form is signless.

original: zhes mtshan ma med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs smon pa med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes mtshan ma med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs smon pa med pa'o //
translated: Form is wishless.üîΩThus, the teaching of wishlessness is inexhaustible.

original: zhes smon pa med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes smon pa med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'o //
translated: Form is unconditioned.üîΩThus, the teaching of non-conditioning is inexhaustible.

original: zhes mngon par 'du byed pa med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs ma skyes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes mngon par 'du byed pa med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs ma skyes pa'o //
translated: Form is unborn.üîΩThus, the teaching of non-arising is inexhaustible.

original: zhes ma skyes par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes ma skyes par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs skye ba med pa'o //
translated: Form is non-arising.üîΩThus, the teaching of non-arising is inexhaustible.

original: zhes skye ba med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs sngon gyi mthar ngo bo nyid med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes skye ba med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs sngon gyi mthar ngo bo nyid med pa'o //
translated: Form is essenceless in the past.üîΩThus, the teaching of essencelessness in the past is inexhaustible.

original: zhes sngon gyi mthar ngo bo nyid med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs phyi ma'i @287b mthar ngo bo nyid med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes sngon gyi mthar ngo bo nyid med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs phyi ma'i @287b mthar ngo bo nyid med pa'o //
translated: Form is essenceless in the future.üîΩThus, the teaching of essencelessness in the future is inexhaustible.

original: zhes phyi ma'i mthar ngo bo nyid med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs par du ngo bo nyid med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes phyi ma'i mthar ngo bo nyid med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs par du ngo bo nyid med pa'o //
translated: Form is essenceless in the present.üîΩThus, the teaching of essencelessness in the present is inexhaustible.

original: zhes par du ngo bo nyid med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs rab tu zhi ba'o //
analyzed: zhes par du ngo bo nyid med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs rab tu zhi ba'o //
translated: Form is peace.

original: zhes rab tu zhi bar bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs nye bar zhi ba'o //
analyzed: zhes rab tu zhi bar bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs nye bar zhi ba'o //
translated: Thus, the teaching of peace is inexhaustible.

original: zhes nye bar zhi bar bstan pa mi rzad pa dang / gzugs rgyu ba med pa'o //üîΩzhes rgyu ba med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs spros pa med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes nye bar zhi bar bstan pa mi rzad pa dang / gzugs rgyu ba med pa'o // zhes rgyu ba med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs spros pa med pa'o //
translated: Thus, the teaching of complete peace is inexhaustible.üîΩThus, the teaching of non-movement is inexhaustible.

original: zhes spros pa med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //üîΩzhes bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs mtshungs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes spros pa med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o // zhes bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs mtshungs pa med pa'o //
translated: Thus, the teaching of non-elaboration is inexhaustible.üîΩThus, the teaching of inconceivability is inexhaustible.

original: zhes mtshungs pa med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs bdag med pa'o //üîΩzhes bdag med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs sems can med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes mtshungs pa med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs bdag med pa'o // zhes bdag med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs sems can med pa'o //
translated: Thus, the teaching of incomparability is inexhaustible.üîΩThus, the teaching of selflessness is inexhaustible.

original: zhes sems can med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs srog med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes sems can med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs srog med pa'o //
translated: Thus, the teaching of the absence of sentient beings is inexhaustible.

original: zhes srog med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs gso ba med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes srog med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs gso ba med pa'o //
translated: Thus, the teaching of the absence of life force is inexhaustible.üîΩThus, the teaching of the absence of a nourished being is inexhaustible.

original: zhes gso ba med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs gang zag med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes gso ba med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs gang zag med pa'o //
translated: Thus, the teaching of non-healing is inexhaustible.

original: zhes gang zag med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs bem po'o //üîΩzhes bem por bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs g-yo ba med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes gang zag med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs bem po'o // zhes bem por bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs g-yo ba med pa'o //
translated: Thus, the teaching of non-person is inexhaustible.üîΩThus, the teaching of matter is inexhaustible.

original: zhes g-yo ba med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs byed pa med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes g-yo ba med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs byed pa med pa'o //
translated: Thus, the teaching of non-motion is inexhaustible.

original: zhes byed pa med par bstan pa mi @288a *//üîΩzad pa dang / gzugs rtsva dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang / bong ba dang / mig yor lta bu'o //üîΩzhes rtsva dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang / bong ba dang / mig yor lta bur bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs rnam par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: zhes byed pa med par bstan pa mi @288a *// zad pa dang / gzugs rtsva dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang / bong ba dang / mig yor lta bu'o // zhes rtsva dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang / bong ba dang / mig yor lta bur bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs rnam par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Thus, the teaching of non-action is inexhaustible.üîΩThus, the teaching of grass, walls, trees, clods of earth, and illusions is inexhaustible.üîΩThus, the teaching of the characteristics of the accomplishment of matter is inexhaustible.

original: zhes rnam par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid du bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes rnam par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid du bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa'o //
translated: Thus, the teaching of the transformation of matter is inexhaustible.

original: zhes 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs sgra med pa'o //üîΩzhes sgra med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs rnam par rig pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs sgra med pa'o // zhes sgra med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs rnam par rig pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: This is the inexhaustibility of the teaching of the four great elements.üîΩThis is the inexhaustibility of the teaching of soundlessness.

original: zhes rnam par rig pa ma yin par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs brjod du med pa'o //üîΩzhes brjod du med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs rang gi ngang gis yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes rnam par rig pa ma yin par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs brjod du med pa'o // zhes brjod du med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs rang gi ngang gis yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: This is the inexhaustibility of the teaching of non-perception.üîΩThis is the inexhaustibility of the teaching of inexpressibility.

original: zhes rang gi ngang gis yongs su dag par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes rang gi ngang gis yongs su dag par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o //
translated: This is the inexhaustibility of the teaching of natural purity.

original: zhes rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs chad pa med pa'o //üîΩzhes chad pa med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs rtag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs chad pa med pa'o // zhes chad pa med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs rtag pa med pa'o //
translated: This is the inexhaustibility of the teaching of dependent origination.üîΩThis is the inexhaustibility of the teaching of non-annihilation.

original: zhes rtag pa med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs byed pa po med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes rtag pa med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs byed pa po med pa'o //
translated: This is the inexhaustibility of the teaching of non-eternality.üîΩThis is the inexhaustibility of the teaching of non-creator.

original: zhes byed pa po med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs tshor ba po med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes byed pa po med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs tshor ba po med pa'o //
translated: Form is not a feeler.üîΩThus, the teaching on the absence of a feeler is inexhaustible.

original: @288b zhes tshor ba po med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa'o //
analyzed: @288b zhes tshor ba po med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa'o //
translated: Form is established by the ripening of karma.üîΩThus, the teaching on establishment by the ripening of karma is inexhaustible.

original: zhes las kyi rnam par smin pas grub par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: zhes las kyi rnam par smin pas grub par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'o //
translated: Form is equal to the realm of phenomena.üîΩThus, the teaching on equality with the realm of phenomena is inexhaustible.

original: zhes chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs de bzhin nyid la rab tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs de bzhin nyid la rab tu gnas pa'o //
translated: Form is well-established in suchness.üîΩThus, the teaching on being well-established in suchness is inexhaustible.

original: zhes de bzhin nyid la rab tu gnas par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes de bzhin nyid la rab tu gnas par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas pa'o //
translated: Form is well-established in the limit of reality.

original: zhes yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs nga yi ba med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs nga yi ba med pa'o //
translated: Thus, the teaching on being well-established in the limit of reality is inexhaustible.üîΩForm is not mine.üîΩThus, the teaching on the absence of mine is inexhaustible.

original: zhes nga yi ba med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes nga yi ba med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o //
translated: Form is not grasped at.

original: zhes yongs su 'dzin pa med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs zin pa med pa'o /
analyzed: zhes yongs su 'dzin pa med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs zin pa med pa'o /
translated: Thus, it is shown to be inexhaustible as the teaching of non-apprehension.

original: zhes zin pa med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //üîΩzhes bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs mtshungs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes zin pa med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o // zhes bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs mtshungs pa med pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is shown to be inexhaustible as the teaching of non-grasping.üîΩThus, it is shown to be inexhaustible as the teaching of the inconceivable.

original: zhes mtshungs pa med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs tshad med pa'o //üîΩzhes tshad med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs thug pa med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes mtshungs pa med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs tshad med pa'o // zhes tshad med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs thug pa med pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is shown to be inexhaustible as the teaching of the incomparable.üîΩThus, it is shown to be inexhaustible as the teaching of the immeasurable.

original: zhes thug pa med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs byang chub kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes thug pa med par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs byang chub kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: Thus, it is shown to be inexhaustible as the teaching of the boundless.

original: zhes byang chub kyi rang bzhin du @289a *//üîΩbstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: zhes byang chub kyi rang bzhin du @289a *// bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is shown to be inexhaustible as the teaching of the nature of enlightenment.üîΩThus, it is shown to be inexhaustible as the teaching of the nature of nirvana.

original: zhes nam mkha' dang mnyam par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes nam mkha' dang mnyam par bstan pa mi zad pa dang / gzugs mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Thus, it is shown to be inexhaustible as the teaching of the equality of space.

original: zhes mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin du bstan pa mi zad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin du bstan pa mi zad pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is taught to be the nature of nirvana.

original: de bzhin du phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / ming gi tshogs dang / tshig gi tshogs dang / yi ge'i tshogs thams cad dang / chos thams cad kyi bar du 'ang sgra gcig brjod pa la 'jug pas bstan pa mi zad pa shes par thams cad la rgyas par sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / ming gi tshogs dang / tshig gi tshogs dang / yi ge'i tshogs thams cad dang / chos thams cad kyi bar du 'ang sgra gcig brjod pa la 'jug pas bstan pa mi zad pa shes par thams cad la rgyas par sbyar ro //
translated: In the same way, it should be applied extensively to all, up to the aggregates, elements, sense bases, all collections of names, collections of phrases, and collections of letters, and all phenomena, by understanding the inexhaustible teaching through the engagement of a single sound.

original: 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa lus kyi za ma tog 'di'i mi zad pa yongs su brjod pa shes pa dang / rin po che'i za ma tog chos kyi rnam grangs mi zad pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / bstan pa shes pa mi zad pa 'di ni /

analyzed: bstan pa ther 'bum dang / khrag khrig dang / gtams dang / dkrigs dang / mi 'khrugs pa dang / tshad med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / dpag tu med pa la mi chags so //

analyzed: gang zag gang la'ang ma zhen 'di ni shes rab rtsa //

translated: From the wisdom that realizes the Sa·πÖgha as unconditioned.

analyzed: blo ldan gtong ba dran pa de ni shes rab rtsa //

analyzed: gang phyir nyon mongs kun 'dor 'di ni shes rab las //

analyzed: tshul khrims shin tu dag pa dran 'di shes rab rtsa; ;tshul khrims zag pa med la gnas ni shes rab las //

original: che ba'i bdag nyid lha dran 'di ni shes rab rtsa //
analyzed: che ba'i bdag nyid lha dran 'di ni shes rab rtsa //

original: dge nas dag pa dran pa 'di ni shes rab las //
analyzed: dge nas dag pa dran pa 'di ni shes rab las //

analyzed: gang phyir bsgrims te thos pa tshol ba shes rab rtsa //

original: gzhan dag las ni phyis mi tshol ba shes rab las //
analyzed: gzhan dag las ni phyis mi tshol ba shes rab las //

original: legs par byed pa'i las byed 'di ni shes rab rtsa //
analyzed: legs par byed pa'i las byed 'di ni shes rab rtsa //

original: las phyis mngon par 'du mi byed pa shes rab las //
analyzed: las phyis mngon par 'du mi byed pa shes rab las //

original: nga rgyal med cing 'dud par byed pa shes rab rtsa //
analyzed: nga rgyal med cing 'dud par byed pa shes rab rtsa //

original: bdag gi don la brtson 'gyur 'di ni shes rab rtsa //
analyzed: bdag gi don la brtson 'gyur 'di ni shes rab rtsa //

analyzed: sems can theg gsum nges 'byung byed pa shes rab las //

analyzed: blo gros ldan pa sbyin dang snyan par smra ba dang / don byed sems can yongs su smin byed @313a *// shes rab rtsa //

original: gal te don mthun pa yis sangs rgyas yon tan 'god //

original: 'di ni skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi shes rab las //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
